snippet: The IHT's Suzy Menkes will convene the great and the good of fashion to discuss the relationship between Africa and the trillion-dollar global industry. Can development for the poorest go hand in hand with consumption by the richest? Is "sustainable...
abstract: The IHT's Suzy Menkes will convene the great and the good of fashion to discuss the relationship between Africa and the trillion-dollar global industry. Can development for the poorest go hand in hand with consumption by the richest? Is "sustainable fashion" an oxymoron?

headline.main: Send Us Your Questions for Fashion's Most Powerful Leaders
